title: Knowledge Domain
content:
ILIENT SPHERE

Enclose a target in a sphere of shimmering force, reducing its movement speed by half, and blocking all incoming and outgoing damage.

3 TurnsThe target can't be Huge in size.

9m DEX SaveConcentration

Transform a creature into a harmless sheep.

18m WIS SaveConcentration

Turn a creature's flesh hard as stone. It takes only half the damage of all non-magical Bludgeoning, Piercing. and Slashing damage.

Melee Concentration

Create a blazing wall of fire, burning anyone who dares
